xx.UI_CHALLENGES_COLORADO_EXP_SHOOT_BOTTLES: • Shoot all the green bottles on the moose antlers in 5 seconds.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_COLORADO_EASTER_EGG_EXIT_D: Feed 10 apricots to the dinosaur, while having bergs drugs in han then alternate exit will apear, the dinosaur toy instead of the quad bike. The challenge unlocs when the player rides the dino bike
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_COLORADO_EASTER_EGG_WICKER: If the player shoots 4 bells in the distance whilst wearing the Scarecrow outfit then any NPCs in a small radius of the player will set on fire
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_COLORADO_EASTER_EGG_DANCIN: If the player navigates to the house garden, throws an apricot at the training leaderâ€™s head (enforcer) and turns on the radio in between the training NPCs and the garden shed all the NPCs will perform a line dancing style coordinated dance sequence.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_COLORADO_SPAWN_LOCATION_GA: • Start in the garage disguised as a technician.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_COLORADO_47_MASTER_OF_DISG: • Find and equip all disguises in Colorado.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_COLORADO_SPAWN_LOCATION_GR: • Start in the greenhouse disguised as a soldier.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_COLORADO_SCARE_AXE_KILL_DE:
• Assassinate 1 target with a lethal throw using the axe while disguised as the Scarecrow.
  • The assassination must be seen.
  • Your disguise must be compromised.
  • Return to an uncompromised state without changing your disguise.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_COLORADO_SCARE_POISON_KILL:
• Assassinate 2 targets with a lethal syringe while disguised as the Scarecrow.
  • Each assassination must be seen.
  • Your disguise must be compromised each time.
  • Return to an uncompromised state after each assassination without changing your disguise.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_COLORADO_SCARE_FIRE_KILL_D:
• Assassinate 3 targets by burning them while disguised as the Scarecrow.
  • Each assassination must be seen.
  • Your disguise must be compromised each time.
  • Return to an uncompromised state after each assassination without changing your disguise.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_COLORADO_SCARE_MASTER_SCAR: • Complete all Scarecrow challenges: Birth of the Scarecrow, They Scream, They Cry, Taste of Your Own Medicine and Lighten Up.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_COLORADO_47_ASSASINATION_F: • Assassinate a target with the fiber wire.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_COLORADO_47_MASTER_OF_TRAD:
Complete all the Versatile challenges in Colorado:
  • Piano Man
  • Someone Could Hurt Themselves
  • Hold My Hair
  • Straight Shot
  • Tasteless, Traceless
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_COLORADO_SPAWN_LOCATION_CY: • Start in the farm house disguised as a hacker.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_COLORADO_EASTER_EGG_SCAREC: Visit all the scarecrow hips wearing the outfit
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_COLORADO_EXP_HIDE_BODIES_P: • Dump all 4 targets in the slurry pit.
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_COLORADO_SPAWN_LOCATION_FI: • Start in the demolition range disguised as an explosives specialist.
